question: My father had triple bypass surgery 10 weeks ago, and ever since the surgery he has trouble eating because everything tastes salty.  The only new medication he is taking since the surgery is Cumadin.  He is still taking the diabetes, blood pressure, potassium, etc., he was taking prior to surgery.Does anyone know if the Cumadin has a side effect that could cause the "salty" taste?  He has lost from 180 lbs. to 153 lbs.Any help would be appreciated.
title: Cumadin
